title: The login server did not respond
body: I'm a new player of league of legends and every time i try to to login to league it shows up server did not respond attempting to connect (1...2...30 and nothing happen i have tried literally everything from changing thing i never knew were in IE to disabling my firewall and re-installing multiple times and i really need some help because i played league on my friends laptop at my house but when i try to play on my desktop computer it doesn't work SOMEONE HELP PLZ!
